name: gcred-contracts
description: Typescript functions for interacting with gcred contracts

scripts.deploy:mockMiners: source .env.local && cross-env MINER_INDEX=1 forge script script/Demo.s.sol --fork-url $FORK_URL --mnemonic-paths mnemonic --mnemonic-indexes 1 --target-contract MockMinerDeploy --broadcast -vvvv
